#messages {
	background: #ffffff;
}

.chat__message {
	background: #F5F5F5;
}

.chat__item--responder .chat__message,
.chat__item--responder .chat__favMessage {
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(#176DBD), to(#00A9FF));
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #176DBD 0%, #00A9FF 100%);
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #176DBD 0%, #00A9FF 100%);
	background: -o-linear-gradient(left, #176DBD 0%, #00A9FF 100%);
	background: linear-gradient(90deg, #176DBD 0%, #00A9FF 100%);
	color: #ffffff;
}

.action_button,
.scheduled-message__cancel {
	color: #00A0F2;
}

.chat__info {
	background: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1);
	color: #2E3238;
}

.chat__info-link {
	color: #2E3238;
}

.chat__item--responder .action_button,
.chat__item--responder .scheduled-message__cancel,
.chat__item--responder .chat__message-content,
.chat__item--responder .chat__message-author,
.chat__item--responder .chat__message-time {
	color: #FFFFFF;
}

.chat__item--responder .chat__message-favNotSelected {
	background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
}

.chat__item--responder .chat__message-favSelected {
	background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
}

.chat__item--responder .chat__message-content > a  {
	color: #FFFFFF;
	font-weight: bold;
}

.quoted__message {
	border-color: #FFFFFF;
}

#dialog::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
	background-color: #0895E9
}

#dialog::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
	background-color: #0676b8;
}
